job_details.Functieomschrijving: Als stagiair binnen de Creative Craft van Greenhouse krijg je de kans om mee te werken aan online marketing campagnes voor A-merk klanten als Vodafone, Kruidvat en Volkswagen. Je klanten en je team vertrouwen op jouw design of coding skills. Samen met je collega's (designers, developers, marketeers) ontwikkel je de mooiste en meest effectieve online creaties. Denk aan banner creatie, social media ads, online video's en het ontwikkelen van andere online creatieve concepten en tools. Bouw je liever mee aan innovatieve oplossingen die nog in de kinderschoenen staan? Dat kan ook! Voorbeelden hiervan zijn Conversational, AR, Generative AI en Digital Audio.
job_details.full_text:
Media designer / developer stage

Als stagiair binnen de Creative Craft van Greenhouse krijg je de kans om mee te werken aan online marketing campagnes voor A-merk klanten als Vodafone, Kruidvat en Volkswagen. Je klanten en je team vertrouwen op jouw design of coding skills. Samen met je collega's (designers, developers, marketeers) ontwikkel je de mooiste en meest effectieve online creaties. Denk aan banner creatie, social media ads, online video's en het ontwikkelen van andere online creatieve concepten en tools. Bouw je liever mee aan innovatieve oplossingen die nog in de kinderschoenen staan? Dat kan ook! Voorbeelden hiervan zijn Conversational, AR, Generative AI en Digital Audio.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on media design and development for online marketing campaigns, including banner creation, social media ads, and online videos. While it mentions 'Generative AI' as a potential area for development, the primary responsibilities and listed tasks are not centered around core AI engineering roles like model development, MLOps, or advanced AI system building. The role appears to be more aligned with creative development and marketing rather than a specialized AI engineering position.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'coding skills' and developing 'other online creative concepts and tools', which aligns with software development aspects of creating online marketing assets.
Developing 'innovative solutions' and 'tools' fits within the scope of software development, even if the specific technologies are emerging.
job_tasks.phrase: developing other online creative concepts and tools

job_tasks.justification: Mentioning the development of specific AI-related areas like 'Conversational, AR, Generative AI and Digital Audio' implies building applications or features related to these technologies, which falls under software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Conversational, AR, Generative AI and Digital Audio

job_tasks.justification: The role involves working on 'online marketing campaigns for A-brand clients', indicating a need to understand business objectives and client needs within the marketing domain.
job_tasks.phrase: online marketing campaigns for A-brand clients

soft_skills.phrase: Together with your colleagues (designers, developers, marketers) you develop the most beautiful and effective online creations.
Do you prefer to help build innovative solutions that are still in their infancy?
